title: Skeletons
description: Skeletons, everyone has one, and in this collection of dark short stories they're scratching their way to the surface for the world to see. In Skeletons you'll meet a man who confesses his secret time traveling fetish, a cashier who investigates the eerie behavior of his retail co-workers, a torn lover who travels to her boyfriend's haunted retreat, a teenager whose town undergoes some unusual changes, and a father whose personal time is moving a little too fast.
author: Kenneth Buff
